testsuite.name: SimpleBankSystemTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #4
Your table should have columns described in the stage instructions.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -fileName card.s3db
-fileName card.s3db jdbc:sqlite:card.s3db 1. Create an account 2. Log into account 0. Exit > 0
Bye!
